front.title: DHCP options for Access Point Name and attach type indication

abstract.t: Cellular data networks which are based on 3GPP standards use the concept of Access Point Name. A mobile node which attaches via a 3GPP access network indicates thru layer 2 signaling the access point name to which connectivity is desired. This document specifies a DHCP option which enables the mobile node to request the access point name in DHCP messages. A mobile node whose mobility is managed by the network using Proxy Mobile IPv6 protocol may perform a handover from one access technology to another. A DHCP option which enables the host to indicate if the attachment via the new interface is a handover or another connction is also specified.
